label: Dropbox
description: Arcade tools designed for LLMs to interact with Dropbox

tools.name: DownloadFile
tools.description:
Downloads the specified file.

Note: either one of `file_path` or `file_id` must be provided.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The path of the file to download. E.g. '/AcmeInc/Reports/Q1_2025.txt'. Defaults to None.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the file to download. E.g. 'id:a4ayc_80_OEAAAAAAAAAYa'. Defaults to None.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: ListItemsInFolder
tools.description:
Provides a dictionary containing the list of items in the specified folder path.

Note 1: when paginating, it is not necessary to provide any other argument besides the cursor.
Note 2: when paginating, any given item (file or folder) may be returned in multiple pages.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: The path to the folder to list the contents of. E.g. '/AcmeInc/Reports'. Defaults to an empty string (list items in the Dropbox root folder).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to 100. Maximum allowed is 2000.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor token for the next page of results. Defaults to None (returns the first page of results).

output.description: Dictionary containing the list of files and folders in the specified folder path

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: SearchFilesAndFolders
tools.description:
Returns a list of items in the specified folder path matching the search criteria.

Note 1: the Dropbox API will return up to 10,000 (ten thousand) items cumulatively across
multiple pagination requests using the cursor token.
Note 2: when paginating, it is not necessary to provide any other argument besides the cursor.
Note 3: when paginating, any given item (file or folder) may be returned in multiple pages.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to search for. E.g. 'quarterly report'. Maximum length allowed by the Dropbox API is 1000 characters.

parameters.name: search_in_folder_path
parameters.description: Restricts the search to the specified folder path. E.g. '/AcmeInc/Reports'. Defaults to None (search in the entire Dropbox).

parameters.name: filter_by_category
parameters.description: Restricts the search to the specified category(ies) of items. Provide None, one or multiple, if needed. Defaults to None (returns all categories).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to 100. Maximum allowed is 1000.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor token for the next page of results. Defaults to None (first page of results).

output.description: List of items in the specified folder path matching the search criteria
